CustomField.description: **System Calculated/Override** Checked when a Sales Order is charged to the customer on a recurring, never-ending basis. These "Standing Sales Orders" are never closed until cancelled.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: **System Calculated/Override** Checked when a Sales Order is charged to the customer on a recurring, never-ending basis. These "Standing Sales Orders" are never closed until cancelled.
CustomField.label: Is Evergreen
